title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Gather and document the detailed requirements for the AI-enhanced Security Operations Center (SOC), including the desired features, integrations, performance expectations, security considerations, and compliance with industry standards and regulations. The requirements should cover the following aspects:

- Threat detection capabilities (e.g., network traffic analysis, log monitoring, endpoint monitoring)
- AI/ML models for anomaly detection, threat classification, and prioritization
- Integration with existing security tools and data sources (e.g., SIEM, firewalls, IDS/IPS)
- Automation of triage and initial response actions (e.g., alert escalation, incident tracking, playbook execution)
- User interface and reporting capabilities for SOC analysts
- Scalability and performance requirements for handling large volumes of security data
- Security and privacy requirements for handling sensitive data, emphasizing secure data storage, encryption, and access control
- Compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations (e.g., NIST, PCI DSS, GDPR), considering periodic audits and updates to maintain compliance
- Documentation of all components, including architecture diagrams, technical documentation, and user guides for easy onboarding and maintenance
- Incorporate feedback from security specialists regarding the secure design and implementation of AI/ML models
- Consider edge cases and potential false positives in the design of threat detection and anomaly detection systems
- Ensure usability and accessibility of the user interface for SOC analysts, including support for multiple languages and screen readers for visually impaired users

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI components, data pipelines, and integrations with existing security tools and infrastructure.

title: Develop AI Models and Algorithms
description: Develop and train the AI models and algorithms for threat detection, triage, and response automation.

title: Build Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the data ingestion and processing pipeline to collect and process security data from various sources.

title: Implement User Interface and Dashboards
description: Design and develop the user interface and dashboards for security analysts to interact with the AI-enabled SOC.

title: Integrate with Existing Security Tools
description: Integrate the AI-enabled SOC with existing security tools and infrastructure, such as SIEM, firewalls, and endpoint protection solutions.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the AI-enabled SOC adheres to relevant security and compliance standards, including data protection, access controls, and audit logging.

title: Set up Testing and Deployment Infrastructure
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure for testing, staging, and deployment of the AI-enabled SOC.

title: Develop Test Plans and Scripts
description: Create comprehensive test plans and scripts to validate the functionality, performance, and security of the AI-enabled SOC.

title: Document System Architecture and User Guides
description: Prepare detailed documentation for the system architecture, deployment, and user guides for the AI-enabled SOC.
